backend/main.mo: Motoko canister handling user profiles, customer registrations, OTP generation/verification, and admin‑restricted registration queries with access control mixins.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence listing frontend files, components, and test IDs for admin panel and admin query integration features.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of each frontend file involved in registration and admin flows.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base stylesheet defining OKLCH color tokens, light/dark variables, and global background/foreground styling.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Top-level React component switching between registration flow and admin panel views.
frontend/src/features/admin/AdminPanel.t: Admin UI handling authentication, admin-claim flow, registration list, and detailed registration view.
frontend/src/features/admin/hooks/useAdm: React Query hooks for admin role checks, admin claiming, and fetching registrations or single registration entries.
frontend/src/features/registration/hooks: Defines React Query mutations for generating and verifying OTPs and submitting registration data, including converting uploaded files to blobs.
frontend/src/features/registration/Regis: Multi-step customer registration UI coordinating form steps, navigation, and admin panel link.
frontend/src/features/registration/steps: Presents a form for entering customer details, validates inputs, and reports validity and data upward.
Handles OTP generation, verification, and triggers registration submission, showing success UI upon completion.
Displays terms and conditions and reports acceptance with a timestamp when the user agrees.
Manages file uploads for Aadhaar and PAN documents and reports validity and selected files upward.
frontend/src/features/registration/terms: Exports structured text sections for router and service-related terms and conditions.
frontend/src/features/registration/types: Defines TypeScript interfaces for registration steps including customer details, documents, and step props.
frontend/src/features/registration/valid: Validates customer detail fields such as name, phone, DOB, email, and address, returning error messages.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor instance tied to user identity, handling authentication and access control initialization.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for managing Internet Identity authentication, including loading, login, logout, and status tracking. Wraps AuthClient creation with configurable options and exposes identity state via a custom hook.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and theme variables for light and dark mode, applying them globally to the app. Sets up color tokens, border behavior, and default body styling.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React application, wrapping the root component with React Query and Internet Identity providers. Imports global styles and renders the App component.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility helpers for reading URL parameters, persisting them in sessionStorage, and cleaning them from the URL hash. Supports both standard and hash-based routing.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration enabling dark mode, custom colors, fonts, radii, animations, and plugin integration. Maps CSS variables to theme colors and extends layout and animation utilities.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata, versioning, and feature requirements for a multi‑step customer registration app and admin panel. Documents existing features and architectural notes.
